name: Galactic Dwarfare
description:
In a universe ruled by the lust for Ale, many dwarfs have found their worlds to small for their taste and turned to other planets in hopes of finding the one ale to rule them all.

Command vast armies and unite against opposing clans. Send your dwarfs to battle and conquer other small worlds until only you remain!

Controls

Left Mouse = Select world
Right Mouse = Attack world / Cancel Selection
Scroll Wheel = Zoom in/-out
Q / E = Raise Lower Army size
